- [Русский](https://docs.codescoring.ru/dependencies/php/index.md)

# Working with dependencies in PHP

## Composer

### Creating a `composer.lock` file

1. Initialize the project:

   ```
   composer init
   ```

1. Install dependencies:

   ```
   composer install
   ```

   or create a lock-file directly:

   ```
   composer update
   ```
